summary: In order to immortalize his love, a groom decides to create conflict between his and his to-be bride's families.
cast: Anang Desai|Supriya Pathak|Rajeev Mehta|Nimisha Vakharia|Jamnadas Majethia|Kirti Kulhari|Gireesh Sahdev|Kesar Majethia|Markand Soni|Deven Bhojani|Nishikant Dixit|Paresh Ganatra|Farah Khan|Krupa Maldechandera|Arvind Nagar|Tina Parekh|Satish Shah|Sanjay Sharma|Arvind Vaidya|Sunil Vishrani
title: Khichdi: The Movie
